This page hosts the files for the Parachain Health project.

The R dashboard, Python dashboard, and slide presentation can be accessed from the top navigation bar.

There is also a Shiny app which can be accessed [here](https://sagepoint.shinyapps.io/parachain_health/).

The source code for this website, which has the code for both dashboards, is available on [Github](https://github.com/rogerjbos/web_parity).
